title: 5 Ways to Celebrate Springtime in SoBe
more_content:
Spring in South Beach isn’t all student crowds and boozy beach bashes. Springtime brings colorful walking tours, local fresh eats, blooming flowers, and lots of only-in Miami activities. Here are five of our favorite ways to celebrate SoBe this spring.

1. Get Your Floral Fix at the Miami Beach Botanical Garden

Walk into a spring wonderland of lush flora at the Miami Beach Botanical Garden. The 2.6 acre garden features subtropical plants from around the world, unusual palms, a Japanese Garden, tranquil ponds, and plants native to South Florida. Admission is always free. Open 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. daily. Closed Mondays.

2. Pretty in Pastel: Take a Tour of the Art Deco District

Sherbet colored buildings line the streets of South Beach, creating a quintessential Miami visual masterpiece. View our Art Deco District Visitor’s Guide for all you need to know about the area, including history, style characteristics, and where to find the highest concentration of colorful buildings. Remember to pop into the Art Deco Welcome Center to browse their free museum and gift shop to pick up unique SoBe souvenirs. Open daily 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Thursdays, 9 a.m. - 7 p.m.

3. Get a Bird’s Eye View of Miami

Springtime is for the birds! Fly over Miami Beach in a helicopter tour and rise up among the buildings, bridges, and turquoise waters of SoBe as you make a circuit of the city. From beginning to end, this thrilling experience is nothing short of unforgettable. Visit Fly Miami Beach or South Beach Helicopters to find the right air tour package for you.

4. Have a Picnic at South Pointe Park

The 17-acre urban park has undergone a total transformation in recent years and now includes paved pathways, grassy areas, dog parks, water features for children to splash around in, an observation deck, and the new pier. Fish from the pier, watch cruise ships roll in, or pack a picnic to enjoy on a beautiful spring day in this beautiful space.

5. Eat Local with the Best of Spring’s Bounty

Discover local flavors on the gourmet SoBe Cultural Food and Walking Tour. Explore 5-star restaurants and hidden gem foodie favorites as you make your way around the Art Deco District. Learn about South Beach cuisine from your expert guide and visit five kitchens for generous tastings that blend the neighborhood’s diverse Latin and Mediterranean flavors. Make a reservation with this highly regarded walking tour and get ready to eat your way through SoBe this spring.
